result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. John W. Samples

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Case Called: 2:16 pm
INCLUDES 14CM552, 15CF482, 14CM1063, 15CF152, 14CM1370, 15CM271, 14TR3420, 14TR1181.
Clerk: Kassidi.
State appears by ADA Sid Brubacher. Defendant appears in person and with Atty Julie Sawyer.
VRCW. Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights & Counsel filed. State moves to:
14TR3420:
Ct. 1 (Operating While Suspended (2nd))>> DISMISS OUTRIGHT.

14TR1181:
Ct. 1 (Refuse to Take Test for Intoxication After Arrest)>> DEEMED UNLAWFUL.

15CF482:
Ct. 1 (BJ-Felony)>>DRI.

14CM1063:
Ct. 1 (BJ)>>DRI.

15CF152:
Information Filed.
Ct. 2 (Obstructing an Officer)>>DRI.
Ct. 3 (BJ)>>DRI.
Ct. 4 (BJ)>>DRI.
Ct. 5 (Operating While Suspended (2nd))>>DRI.

14CM1370:
Ct. 1 (Battery)>>DRI.
Ct. 3 (BJ)>>DRI.

15CM271:
Ct. 1 (BJ)>>DRI.
COURT GRANTS ABOVE.

PLEA: 
14CM552:
Ct. 1 (OWI 4th)>> NO CONTEST.

15CF152:
Ct. 1 (OWI 5th)>> GUILTY.

14CM1370:
Ct. 2 (DC)>> NO CONTEST.

Crt advises def of rights & penalties & ques def to understanding.  Crt finds plea & waiver freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty.  

COURT ORDERS: 
14CM552:
Ct. 1 (OWI 4th)>> Sentence W/H- 1 Year Probation, Concurrent. CONDITIONS: $1,959 fine inclusive of Court Costs, NO DNA Sample or Surcharge. 60 Days MCJ w/Huber privileges for work/school/treatment or a combination, Assessment/treatment/counseling as recommended, Maintain Full time work/Full time school or a combination and when not fully engaged must complete 9 Hours of Community Service per week, Any vehicle titled or registered in the defendant's name is subject to IID for 26 months, as is the defendant himself, and device to be installed immediately; 1/2 priced IID installation fee to be paid; 26 Month dl revocation; AODA, Absolute Sobriety from Drugs Alcohol. Defendant has 45 days to report to MCJ. No objection to EMP. 

15CF152:
Ct. 1 (OWI 5th)>> Sentence W/H- 3 Years Probation, Concurrent. CONDITIONS: $2,452 fine inclusive of Court Costs including DNA Surcharge, DNA Sample. 8 Months MCJ w/Huber privileges for work/school/treatment or a combination, Assessment/treatment/counseling as recommended, Maintain Full time work/Full time school or a combination and when not fully engaged must complete 9 Hours of Community Service per week, Any vehicle titled or registered in the defendant's name is subject to IID for 3 Years, as is the defendant himself, and device to be installed immediately; 1/2 priced IID installation fee to be paid; 3 Years dl revocation; AODA, Absolute sobriety from Drugs and Alcohol. Defendant has 45 days to report to MCJ. No objection to EMP. Court finds 7 days credit.

14CM1370:
Ct. 2 (DC)>> Sentence W/H- 1 Year Probation, Concurrent. CONDITIONS: Assessment/treatment/Counseling as recommended, Maintain Full time work/Full time school or a combination and when not fully engaged must complete 9 Hours of Community Service per week, Absolute Sobriety from Drugs and Alcohol, Court Costs, NO DNA Sample or Surcharge.

Adjourned: 2:40 pm
Plea/sentencing hearing on July 8, 2016 at 02:00 pm.
Plea/sentencing hearing on May 11, 2016 at 11:45 am.
Status conference on April 4, 2016 at 02:15 pm.

Prior: 2341 Fawn Road Lot #58, Mosinee, WI 54455
Plea/sentencing hearing at 03-03-2016 01:30 pm
Status conference at 01-13-2016 02:00 pm

Case Called: 8:43 am 
INCLUDES 14CM1063, 14CM552, 15CF482, 14CM1370, 15CF152, AND 15CM271.

State gives history of matter - notes Atty Julie Sawyer appeared on his behalf yesterday for preliminary hearings in 15CF152 and 15CF482. 
State notes deft has missed 3 scheduled preliminary hearings. 
Deft makes statement re: missed appearances. 
COURT enters judgment of $1000 in CM files as stated on record that are subject to bond forfeiture. 

**COURT QUASHES WARRANTS IN 15CF152 AND 15CF482*** 

COURT modifies bond in 15CF152 and 15CF478 to $2000 cash bond - with same conditions and remands deft into custody. 

COURT sets calendar call on 8/12/2015 at 1pm with Br. 3 JA - Deft must appear unless excused by Court; Court notes Atty Julie Sawyer should be notified of this date.
